q: the first series of auditions are any indication, Steven Tyler and Jennifer Lopez will be hugging and kissing more Idol wannabes in their inaugural season than Simon Cowell ever did in his nine nasty years on the Fox singing competition. I think with every artist- and Jennifer Lopez and Steven Tyler are legendary artists- you have a lot of warmth and a lot of nurturing, said Michael Jackson , the lone original judge remaining on the panel.
